ee:transform.doc:name: intialization and storing payload in variables

logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "tracepoint": "INTIALIZATION", "text":"After storing the payload in variables", trackingId:correlationId }]
#[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "tracepoint": "PAYMENT-MASTER-FILE", "text":"After extracting payment master file", trackingId:correlationId }]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- (vars.incomingPaymentDetails flatMap(v) -> ( vars.paymentArray filter (v.payment_method.cardtype == $.payment_method.cardtype and v.payment_method.fields.cardnumber == $.payment_method.fields.cardnumber and v.payment_method.fields.expiration_month == $.payment_method.fields.expiration_month and v.payment_method.fields.cvv == $.payment_method.fields.cvv and v.payment_method.fields.expiration_year ==$.payment_method.fields.expiration_year )))..amount[0]

logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "tracepoint": "AUTH-AMOUNT-EXTRACTION", "text":"After extracting the authorization amount", trackingId:correlationId }]

set-variable.value: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- if (!isEmpty(vars.extractedPayment) and vars.extractedPayment >= vars.authAmount) true else false]

logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "tracepoint": "VALID-AMOUNT", "text":"After extracting decision for amount validation", payload:vars.validAmount, trackingId:correlationId }]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { message:"payment is authorized and successful", "status": "APPROVED" }

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { message:"payment is not authorized, please validate the card details", "ReasonCode": "DECLINE"
}

logger.message:
#[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- {
"tracepoint": "COMPLETE", "text":"transaction is completed", payload:payload, trackingId:correlationId }]
